text:

Bella Hadid has admitted she'll always love ex-boyfriend The Weeknd. 
The 20-year-old model and the 26-year-old singer - whose real name is Abel Tesfaye - broke up in November due to their conflicting schedules and Bella revealed she is still coming to terms with the end of their relationship. 
Bella said: "It was my first breakupâ€¦and so public. As an outsider, you might think I handled it so well, but it's always in your heart, and you always feel it very heavily. It'll be hard for a while. Love hurts, but you have to pull through. But I'll always respect him, and I'll always love him." 
She added to Teen Vogue: "Sometimes you want to be sad about it or handle it differently, but at the end of the day, you never want to burn a bridge that you've fought so hard to build." (Photo: Splash News) The Weeknd is now dating Selena Gomez (Photo: Splash News) 
However, The Weeknd has now moved on to Selena Gomez and is said to be besotted with her. 
A source recently said: "He really likes her. They text every day. They have a really sexy and flirty relationship. They laugh and like each other's personalities." 
And Selena is reportedly "happy" with her new beau as he "makes her feel secure". 
A source said: "She is happy and doesn't mind sharing that with the world. 
"Abel makes her feel secure and Selena has nothing to hide. Selena gets passionate about things real fast and that is exactly what she is doing with The Weeknd. Read More Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, (Photo: Rex Features) Selena and The Weeknd make it Instagram official (Photo: Instagram) 
"She finds him charming and is enamoured by the person he is and the way he presents himself to her." 
But one person who isn't so thrilled about The Weeknd and Selena's blossoming relationship is Selena's ex Justin Bieber. 
Justin Bieber skipped the Grammy Awards on Sunday night where The Weeknd performed, instead choosing to do an Instagram Live chat with his fans while he drove around Los Angeles.
